ExternalAccountHierarchyHistory.name: ExternalAccountHierarchyHistory
ExternalAccountHierarchyHistory.description: Represents the history of changes to values in the fields of an external account hierarchy.

DataType.description: Possible values are: Address AnyType AutoNumber Base64 BitVector Boolean Content Currency DataCategoryGroupReference DateOnly DateTime Division Double DynamicEnum Email EncryptedBase64 EncryptedText EntityId EnumOrId ExternalId Fax File HtmlMultiLineText HtmlStringPlusClob InetAddress Json Location MultiEnum MultiLineText Namespace Percent PersonName Phone Raw RecordType SfdcEncryptedText SimpleNamespace StringPlusClob Switchable_PersonName Text TimeOnly Url YearQuarter

ExternalAccountHierarchyId.description: The ID of the external account hierarchy.

Field.description: Possible values are: Account HierarchyType - Hierarchy Type IsAccessibleToParent - Is Accessible to Parent IsActive - Is Hierarchy Active Name Owner Parent Created - Created. FeedEvent - Feed Event IndividualMerged - Individual Merged Locked - Record Locked OwnerAccepted - Owner (Accepted) OwnerAssignment - Owner (Assignment) Unlocked - Record unlocked

NewValue.description: The updated value of the changed field.

OldValue.description: The previous value of the changed field.

ExternalAccountHierarchyHistory.accessRules: You must have a Partner or Customer Community Plus license.
